Yusuf Datti Baba-Ahmed (Listen) (amụrụ na 7 Julaị 1969) bụ onye Naijiria na-ahụ maka akụ na ụba na onye ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị jere ozi dị ka onye nnọchi  anya n' ụlọ ọ ebe iwu maka ndị Kaduna North site na 2011 ruo 2012 na onye otu House of Representatives site na 2003 ruo 2007
Onye otu Labour Party, ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya onye isi ala na ntuli aka onye isi ala nke 2023 na-agba ọsọ n'akụkụ Peter Obi.
Site n'ezinụlọ Baba-Ahmed a ma ama nke Zaria, Baba-Ahmé gụsịrị akwụkwọ na Mahadum Maiduguri
Mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ, ọ rụrụ ọrụ na azụmaahịa na ụlọ akụ ọtụtụ afọ tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị
A họpụtara Baba-Ahmed dị ka onye otu House of Representatives maka Zaria na 2003; mgbe ọ nọ n'ọkwa ahụ, a maara ya maka ikwu okwu megide nrụrụ aka na Agenda nke Atọ
Mgbe ọ hapụsịrị ọrụ n'afọ 2007, Baba-Ahmed gara n'ihu na-akwado maka ezi ọchịchị mgbe ọ laghachiri na ụlọ ọrụ azụmahịa ya Baze ma guzobe Mahadum Baze

Ka ọ na-erule n'afọ 2011, ọ laghachiri na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị ma nwee ihe ịga nke ọma na-azọ ọkwa onye omeiwu maka Kaduna North; Otú ọ dị, ụlọ ikpe ntuli aka kagburu mmeri ya wee hapụ ọrụ ya n'afọ 2012
Mgbe mkpọsa onye isi ala na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma n' afọ 2019 PDP primary, Baba-Ahmed sonyeere Labour Party na 2022 iji bụrụ onye na-agba ọsọ Peter Obi.
A mụrụ Yusuf Datti Baba-Ahmed n'ezinụlọ Baba-Ahmé na Zaria na 1969
Ọ bụ otu n'ime ụmụ iri atọ na atọ nke nna ya, Baba Ahmed, onye bụ onye Arab na-ere ehi site na Mauritania nke oge a onye mechara bụrụ onye ọkà mmụta a ma ama na ọkachamara na iwu Islam.
Baba-Ahmed nwere BSc na MSc na Economics site na Mahadum Maiduguri na Borno Steeti. Ọ rụrụ ọrụ na nchekwa Printing na Minting, Lagos tupu ọ banye na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị.
N'afọ 2006, mgbe ọ bụ onye nnọchi anya gọọmentị etiti, ọ nwetara aha Doctor of Philosophy mgbe ọ gụsịrị akwụkwọ PhD ya na Mahadum Westminster.
A họpụtara Baba-Ahmed n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2003 ka ọ bụrụ onye nnọchi anya Federal House maka Zaria Federal Constituency, Kaduna Steeti
Ọ gbara ọsọ na All Nigeria People's Party (ANPP).

Baba-Ahmed bụ onye a ma ama maka ọrụ ya. N'oge ọchịchị nke Onye isi ala Olusegun Obasanjo, ọ bụ otu n'ime ndị omeiwu na-emegide ikwe ka Obasanjo gbaa ọsọ maka oge nke atọ. N'ọnwa Mee afọ 2006, o kwuru na ya agaghị agba ọsọ maka nhọpụta ọzọ ọ gwụla ma e mere ihe iji nyochaa ebubo na a na-enye ndị otu aka azụ iji kwado mgbanwe iwu dị mkpa maka ọkwa onye isi ala nke atọ. N'afọ 2007, ọ kpọọrọ ndị Independent National Electoral Commission gaa n'ụlọ ikpe maka ntuli aka gara aga

Baba-Ahmed sonyere ma merie ntuli aka Kaduna North Senatorial na 2011 n'okpuru Congress for Progressive Change (CPC) nke Onye isi ala Muhammadu Buhari duziri mgbe ahụ; onye na-azọ ọkwa nke Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) mara ntuli aka ahụ n'ụlọ ikpe nke mere ka a gbanwee mmeri Ahmedzịza na-ese okwu.
N'afọ 2018, ọ gbara ọsọ na-enweghị ihe ịga nke ọma maka tiketi onye isi ala nke Peoples Democratic Party (PDP)

N'afọ 2022, ọ pụtara dị ka onye na-achọ ịbụ gọvanọ na ntuli aka nke Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) maka ntuli aka gọvanọ nke 2023 na Kaduna Steeti, na-ekwu na ọ jụrụ ịzụta vootu ndị nnọchiteanya dị ka ihe kpatara ya
N'abalị asatọ n'ọnwa Julaị n'afọ 2022, a họpụtara ya dị ka onye osote onye isi ala nke Labour Party na ntuli aka nke Nigeria General nke afọ 2023.
N'ikwu okwu na nzukọ mgbasa ozi Alakụba na Abuja na Septemba 2008, Baba-Ahmed kpọrọ ndị nta akụkọ ka ha nye akụkọ ziri ezi n'atụghị egwu

O kwuru na nrụrụ aka na mba ahụ bụ ihe zuru ebe niile, ekpere pụrụ iche na mkpebi siri ike sitere n'aka ndị niile nwere mmasị dị mkpa iji dozie ọnọdụ ahụ.
Baba-Ahmed ghọrọ onye isi nchịkwa nke Baze Research and Data Services Ltd.

Baba-Ahmed bụ onye guzobere na onye isi oche nke Mahadum Baze, mahadum nwere onwe ya dị na Abuja na isi obodo nke, Naijiria  nke meghere n'ọnwa Eprel afọ 2011. N'izo aka na ọmụmụ ya na mba ofesi dị ka ihe atụ, o kwuru na usoro agụmakwụkwọ Naijiria "na-awụ akpata oyi n'ahụ" nakwa na nke a kpaliri ya ịmalite Mahadum Baze.
